data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Rippers Resurrected Map Pack (Savage Worlds)
data.detailed_description:
A set of full-color, detailed maps for your Rippers Resurrected or gothic horror game.


Also included is the World of the Rippers map which is annotated and ready for your Rippers team to explore on this gorgeous, full-color, detailed digital image.

This Map Pack includes:

  • country house and grounds
  • ancient tomb and burial chamber
  • Eastern European courtyard
  • lodge
  • Urban Alleys
  • Annotated World of the Rippers map

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license or an active subscription and any Ruleset (Savage Worlds v4 and Rippers Resurrected suggested).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
